thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Fifth Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, nice hotel
thread.title_full: Great location, nice hotel - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Fifth Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Eveleen O
title: Great location, nice hotel
text:
14 of us stayed here in March for 4 nights. We were in new York for St.Patricks day.
Hotel was nice maybe like an Irish 3 star. It was very clean and breakfast was good.
Staff were lovely except for one or two of the reception desk staff who were unhelpful. location was excellent, just off 5th avenue and about a 5 minute walk from Macys.
I would definitely stay here again.
